**Government Tender Announcement**
==========================

**Acquisition Title**
----------------

Inductively Coupled Plasma Optical Emission Spectrometer with Autosampler

**Award Reference Number**
-----------------------

CB:316:99652723

**Government Contract Notice**
-----------------------------

The National Research Council Canada (NRC) announces its intention to procure an Inductively Coupled Plasma Optical Emission Spectrometer (ICP-OES) with an autosampler for the Energy Mining and Environment Research Centre. The equipment is required to support the Critical Battery Materials Initiative (CBMI) and other research projects.

**Supply Type**
---------------

Laboratory and Scientific Equipment (UNSPSC: 41100000)

* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

**Procurement Method**
----------------------

Competitive Open Bidding
